about_the_game:
Chimera CUSTOM XG is a retro side-scrolling, action packed, bullet hell adventure. Fight the forces of evil in massive sandbox levels that evoke classic run-and-gun combat with challenging boss battles, weapon customization, and more!


Cryo Upgrade Synthesis Tactical Operations and Mutations - The highly debated and controversial ‘CUSTOM’ weapons project is ready to use any classified XG technology to accomplish their mission.


Find and upgrade your gear with unique abilities and mods! Alter your biology with a stronger skeleton, fire proof skin, extra lungs and 14 toes!


Become the ultimate force of nature by mutating your genetic code with the legendary abilities of Earth’s most savage beasts!


Team up, gear up, and take your powers to the extreme as you leave a wake of destruction across Earth’s most ancient sites! Be careful though, because the most dangerous thing you may find is…the truth!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, OpenGL 2

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Intel Only
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal or OpenGL 3
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: MacBook Air, MacBook Pro, iMac, Mac Mini late 2012 and newer; Mac Pro late 2013 and newer; MacBook 2015 and newer
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Catalina 10.15+
  • Processor: Intel Only
  • Memory: 18 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal or OpenGL 3
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: You are a genetically enhanced super soldier tasked with defending Earth from an onslaught of alien foes. Blast your way through endless hordes in a conspiracy riddled side scrolling bullet hell adventure and become more dangerous than the truth. Become the Chimera!
